item.title: Equine Cloning
item.dc:creator: VP Editor
item.description:
ViaGen Pets is a world leader in animal cloning, having delivered thousands of healthy, happy animals. You can begin the cloning process here by making your initial 50% deposit for your horse cloning.

If you are ready to make a purchase but would like to speak with a ViaGen Pets representative before proceeding, please let us know here. After you have submitted your purchase, you will receive an Agreement from ViaGen Pets via email within one business day that can be electronically signed.

The post Equine Cloning appeared first on Viagen Pets.
item.content:encoded:
ViaGen Pets is a world leader in animal cloning, having delivered thousands of healthy, happy animals. You can begin the cloning process here by making your initial 50% deposit for your horse cloning.

If you are ready to make a purchase but would like to speak with a ViaGen Pets representative before proceeding, please let us know here. After you have submitted your purchase, you will receive an Agreement from ViaGen Pets via email within one business day that can be electronically signed.

The post Equine Cloning appeared first on Viagen Pets.

item.title: Express Tissue Banking
item.dc:creator: VP Editor
item.description:
Express Tissue Banking (ETB) preserves your pet's tissue sample for possible future cloning, without having ViaGen Pets develop new cells from the tissue sample.  Express Tissue Banking (ETB) does not allow us to guarantee that your tissue sample will eventually be able to be used to clone your pet.

If you are ready to make a purchase but would like to speak with a ViaGen Pets representative before proceeding, please let us know here.  After you have submitted your purchase, you will receive an Agreement from ViaGen Pets via email within one business day that can be electronically signed.

The post Express Tissue Banking appeared first on Viagen Pets.
item.content:encoded:
Express tissue banking (ETB) preserves your pet’s tissue sample for possible future cloning, without having ViaGen Pets develop new cells from the tissue sample.  Express tissue banking (ETB) does not allow us to guarantee that your tissue sample will eventually be able to be used to clone your pet.

If you are ready to make a purchase but would like to speak with a ViaGen Pets representative before proceeding, please let us know here.

After you have submitted your purchase, you will receive an Agreement from ViaGen Pets via email within one business day that can be electronically signed.

Call us today at 888-876-6104 to learn more about express tissue banking for your pet.

The post Express Tissue Banking appeared first on Viagen Pets.

item.title: Genetic Preservation
item.dc:creator: VP Editor
item.description:
To Learn More about Genetic Preservation, please call 888.876.6104 to speak with one of our Preservation Specialists.

Not free at the moment? Contact us here instead, and a team-member will reach out to you soon!

The post Genetic Preservation appeared first on Viagen Pets.

item.title: Initiate Cloning
item.dc:creator: VP Editor
item.description:
The total cost of dog cloning is $50,000, paid in two equal installments.

The total cost of cat cloning is $50,000, also paid in two equal installments.

The total cost of horse cloning is $85,000, also paid in two equal installments.

The total amount may be subject to State sales tax, and if applicable, it will be billed to Owner as part of the final billing.

If you are ready to make a purchase but would like to speak with a ViaGen Pets representative before proceeding, please call us at 888-876-6104.

After you have submitted your purchase, you will receive a contract from ViaGen Pets via email within one business day.

The post Initiate Cloning appeared first on Viagen Pets.
item.content:encoded:
The total cost of dog cloning is $50,000, paid in two equal installments.

The total cost of cat cloning is $50,000, also paid in two equal installments.

The total cost of horse cloning is $85,000, also paid in two equal installments.

The total amount may be subject to State sales tax, and if applicable, it will be billed to Owner as part of the final billing.

If you are ready to make a purchase but would like to speak with a ViaGen Pets & Equine representative before proceeding, please call us at 888-876-6104.

After you have submitted your purchase, you will receive a contract from ViaGen Pets & Equine via email within one business day.

The post Initiate Cloning appeared first on Viagen Pets.

item.title: Current Client Payments
item.dc:creator: VP Editor
item.description:
If you are already a ViaGen Pets client, you may make payment on any invoice here, including storage fees for Genetic Preservation (GP).

The post Current Client Payments appeared first on Viagen Pets.
